title: I want to rate this higher but

title: Scrolling issues on iPad
text: first, let me say that ChatGPT is the first time I have felt like I am using future technology from a sci-fi movie since VR came to home PCs. It’s honestly changed my life. BUT I will say that I am having scrolling issues on my iPad. The app doesn’t seem to recognize my finger when I am trying to scroll up or down. No other apps on my iPad have this issue.

title: Misleading Specialized GPT labels
text:
I think it is critical for OpenAI to look at the GPTs available on this app. I’ve looked at over a dozen of them so far and they don’t come close to being capable of the tasks they are labeled as.
Video maker GPTs that can’t make videos, slideshow maker that can’t make slideshows, music makers that can’t make music…. It’s a solid pattern down the line.
I don’t think a little quality control and accurate descriptions are that much to ask for from the paid subscription.

title: WOULD 100% RECOMMEND
text: So I’m a Roblox developer and a YouTuber and I really wanted to know how to make a huge project I thought wouldn’t come true came true. My game hasn’t come out yet but it is soon with this app. I literally made something no other developer ever did. I won’t talk a lot about it but you’ll prob see the game in some months or weeks. The biggest problem that made me almost give up on the whole project was the PvP area. I wanted it to be like a morthing game. What I added to keep players playing was a PvP area. In this area your supposed to fight another player like usual but a little different… you will have to be careful for what morth your going to be using for the fight. If you loose you loose your morth you used for the battle and it gets transferred to the winner. I thought I would never done this until I tried ChatGpt. I found scrips on how to make the PvP area. So if u ever found a video on my channel about the game, thank ChatGpt. I wouldn’t have done this without them. 🥹🥰

title: App logging me out every 10 seconds
text:
The app was fine until today (March 17, 2024). App is auto-logging me off within seconds of logging in. This is occurring every time I touch anything, making the app suddenly unusable. If I hit the "speak" button, it logs me off. If I type something and send it, it logs me off.

I restarted my iPhone, reinstalled the app, and am on iOS 17.4 (latest) and v1.2024.066 for the app (latest).

I have a plus subscription yet I am unable to use the app at all as it had suddenly become unusable.
